short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See series scores next to team names on the NHL Bracket Challenge website. Also, see series scores in your browser toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay on top of the NHL Stanley Cup Playoffs with this extension that puts series scores right in your browser toolbar. The design is... simple, but the scores are there, and they're accurate, sourced directly from the NHL's API.

Plus, there's a bonus feature: when you check out a bracket on the NHL Bracket Challenge site, you'll see each team's number of wins right next to their name. No need to open up a new tab to check the chances of your predictions coming true.
